parties.name: The Common Services Agency (more commonly known as NHS National Services Scotland) (‘NSS’)

buyer.name: The Common Services Agency (more commonly known as NHS National Services Scotland) (‘NSS’)

tender.title: Storage and Distribution of Seasonal Influenza Vaccine
tender.description: This framework agreement is for the receipt, storage and distribution of seasonal influenza vaccines to GP practices, social care premises, vaccine holding centres and community pharmacies across NHS Scotland.
